General.Name: Urja Global Limited
General.Description: Urja Global Limited engages in the design, consultancy, integration, supply, installation, commissioning, and maintenance of off-grid and grid-connected solar power plants and decentralized solar applications in India. The company provides e-rickshaw; solar, e-rickshaw, automotive, and inverter batteries; solar inverters; LED street, flood, and panel lights, as well as LED bulbs and slim LED panel lights; PV modules; solar water heaters; solar lanterns; power packs; solar home lighting systems; and solar charge controllers. It also engages in the manufactures lead acid batteries for industrial, solar, and standby power solutions; development of the land for residential buildings and commercial office complexes; and electric vehicles business. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
